title: [Self-directed] Interdisciplinary Arts-Integrated Teaching Methodology Design for Elementary Piano Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational piano teaching methods and basic understanding of arts-integrated education
context.additional_context: Focused on developing interdisciplinary arts-integration strategies applicable to actual elementary piano education settings through action research

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more interdisciplinary art activities (e.g., storytelling, movement, visual arts) suitable for elementary piano education.
Learners can develop assessment tools to measure the effectiveness of arts-integrated education by applying action research methodologies.
Learners can analyze changes in learnersâ€™ attitudes and build a feedback loop to revise educational plans accordingly.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
